title: Major
footnotes: GEOG*3610 Environmental Hydrology may be substituted for GEOG*3000 Fluvial Processes and would be taken in Semester 6.

title: Credit Summary
desc: Students are reminded that 6.00 credits of their B.Sc. (Env.) degree must be at the 3000-4000 level.
Students are encouraged to seek advice on their choices from their faculty advisor.
